TextView.android:text:
Knowing task as and when we travel will save lot of time. 
 
This application acts as a spy which keeps monitoring the place 
you travel and alerts nearby task information. 
 
This Location Service will help you 
 	 To know your current location 
 	 To organize task information 
 	 To fix location using map 
 	 To alert if task is found around 
 
This Location based Intelligent Mobile Organizer initiative is developed by 
 SCUBE,IT Solutions Pvt Ltd ,Hyderabad
